required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study of KHK7580 in Healthy Adult Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetic Study of KHK7580 in Healthy Adult Volunteers

collaborator.agency: Kyowa Hakko Kirin China Pharmaceutical Co., LTD.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective is to evaluate the pharmacokinetic profile of KHK7580 in Chinese healthy adult volunteers. The secondary objective is to evaluate its safety and pharmacodynamics.

primary_outcome.measure: Plasma KHK7580 concentration at each time point
primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,6,8,12,24,36,48,72 hours post-dose for single dose cohort; pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,8,12,16 hours post dose of Day -1 and pre-dose, 2,4,8,12,16,24,36,48,72,96 hours post-dose of Day 8 for multiple dose cohort

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax) of KHK7580
primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,6,8,12,24,36,48,72 hours post-dose for single dose cohort; pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,8,12,16 hours post dose of Day -1 and pre-dose, 2,4,8,12,16,24,36,48,72,96 hours post-dose of Day 8 for multiple dose cohort

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of KHK7580
primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,6,8,12,24,36,48,72 hours post-dose for single dose cohort; pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,8,12,16 hours post dose of Day -1 and pre-dose, 2,4,8,12,16,24,36,48,72,96 hours post-dose of Day 8 for multiple dose cohort

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to the time of last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-t) of KHK7580
primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,6,8,12,24,36,48,72 hours post-dose for single dose cohort; pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,8,12,16 hours post dose of Day -1 and pre-dose, 2,4,8,12,16,24,36,48,72,96 hours post-dose of Day 8 for multiple dose cohort

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time (AUCinf) of KHK7580
primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,6,8,12,24,36,48,72 hours post-dose for single dose cohort; pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,8,12,16 hours post dose of Day -1 and pre-dose, 2,4,8,12,16,24,36,48,72,96 hours post-dose of Day 8 for multiple dose cohort

pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,6,8,12,24,36,48,72 hours post-dose for single dose cohort; pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,8,12,16 hours post dose of Day -1 and pre-dose, 2,4,8,12,16,24,36,48,72,96 hours post-dose of Day 8 for multiple dose cohort

pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,6,8,12,24,36,48,72 hours post-dose for single dose cohort; pre-dose, 0.25, 0.5,1,2,3,4,8,12,16 hours post dose of Day -1 and pre-dose, 2,4,8,12,16,24,36,48,72,96 hours post-dose of Day 8 for multiple dose cohort

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment emergent adverse events (TEAEs)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: [Single dose] baseline to Day 4; [Multiple dose] baseline to Day 12
[Single dose] baseline to Day 4; [Multiple dose] baseline to Day 12
[Single dose] baseline to Day 4; [Multiple dose] baseline to Day 12
[Single dose] baseline to Day 4; [Multiple dose] baseline to Day 12
